Interface JobStateService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    JobMetricsService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JobMonitoringCoordinator, JobStateServiceImpl

    public interface JobStateService
extends JobMetricsService
    A service which defines the three basic stages of a job.

    3.0.0

        void schedule(java.lang.String jobId,
              JobRequest jobRequest,
              Cluster cluster,
              Command command,
              java.util.List<Application> applications,
              int memory)
        Schedules the job.
        Parameters:
        jobId - job id
        jobRequest - job request
        cluster - cluster for the job request based on the tags specified
        command - command for the job request based on command tags and cluster chosen
        applications - applications to use based on the command that was selected
        memory - job memory
